description: Sends a message to the user and waits for their response. Use ASK_USER_QUESTION instead for questions requiring user input. CHAT is primarily for notifications, status updates, or conversational interactions where you need to inform the user of something.
explanation: This plugin sends a message to the user and returns their response. However, for structured questions or when you need specific user input, use ASK_USER_QUESTION instead. CHAT is better suited for conversational interactions, notifications, or status updates.

inputDefinitions.name: message
inputDefinitions.description: The message to send to the user

outputDefinitions.name: response
outputDefinitions.description: The user's response to the message

inputGuidance: You must include an input named 'message' in your inputs.
